page.title: 14LEISURE (FROYLE/HOLYBOURNE)
page.content:
The proper recreation ground for Froyle is at Lower Froyle, but children have been allowed to play on the school field at Upper Froyle, mainly{football}and{cricket. }
The Estate gamekeeper breeds{pheasants for shooting in the Autumn.
There is{fishing}for the members of the Treloar College.
Local people play darts, some belong to a gardening club and there are stables in the village where you can learn to ride.
Both Holybourne and Froyle have{inns } with{restaurants}attached, offering both snacks and proper meals for those who like to spend their leisure time in eating out.
